sentences.english: This is a vast nation like China would let the Sri Lankan bully?
sentences.chinese: 中國這泱泱大國還會讓這斯欺負？

sentences.english: The man of whom I think , Is on the margin of the water .
sentences.chinese: 我思念的心上伊人啊，正在泱泱水邊上。

sentences.english: Business accommodating , the sea, whether the question of who will win?
sentences.chinese: 泱泱商海中，究竟誰將制勝？

sentences.english: They need every modern science for the development of the still latent resources of their mighty Empire.
sentences.chinese: 他們需要各種現代科學來開發其泱泱帝國的潛在資源。

sentences.english: As a grand power, China should have its own systematic philosophy of diplomacy.
sentences.chinese: 作爲泱泱大國，中國應當特別重視對外交哲學的研究。

sentences.english: Great country, decency and prosperous, at a time of peace and harmonious happy.
sentences.chinese: 泱泱大國，禮儀興邦，時值和諧美滿的太平盛世。

sentences.english: This large country on the east side of Africa is full of adventure.
sentences.chinese: 這個位於非洲東部的泱泱大國充滿着各種冒險旅程。

sentences.english: Great country, not even the little things did not know it?
sentences.chinese: 泱泱大國，不會連這個小事都不懂吧？

sentences.english: Tolerance is love sick with the sickness of haughtiness.
sentences.chinese: 容忍對病泱泱的居傲充滿了愛憐與疼愛。

definition: vast and mighty (of river or ocean)/broad and powerful
(particle in old Chinese similar to 啊)
the stream flows without stopping (idiom); unending flow
high as the mountain and long as the river (idiom); fig. noble and far-reaching
